Articles.Content: ![planet-hype.gif](https://wattsupwiththat.files.wordpress.com/2015/02/planet-hype.gif)

> 
> I know how you feel; went to shower, came back to find 8 new pages.

How fast did you take a shower? Two minutes?! It's too fast!

Plaid factor readings are going off the scale!
I don't think i can handle the amount of hype the hypetrain is carrying at this point!!!

> 
> [http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown) Says 13 minutes, lets get moving!!

Damnit, it just jumped up 4 minutes

> 
> [http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown) Says 13 minutes, lets get moving!!

Can we break the 300 barrier before then? I SAY YES!!
Mars will never be free until the sands run red with earther blood!

For those of you looking for HYPE music to listen to while you're hyping: Mysteria

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8X7vc0ChS_s?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Holy boop this is hyping fast. 

Rune. She 'an take it capt'n!

Have some moar hype..

![882.gif](http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/490/096/882.gif)

The Kraken feeds on hype.

JYI
This game is in my opinion the best game I have ever played. Its even better than Age of Mythology. (the game that made me love games in the first place)
\*casts shovel aside and starts throwing space coal into the engine with his bare hands\* Faster! Faster!!

OKAY, WE ARE ALMOST GO!!!!!!

notcaps
Solid Hype Boosters Interstage! Weeeeee! I am afraid we will crash the forums just seconds before the release news

Guys I don't know how you did it, but we are still ACCELLERATING and have broken warp factor 6.6. We are travelling at billions of times lightspeed! It's going to be a heck of an accelleration when we stop. Who's that HypeTrain nosecone guy? Worior or something? Be prepared to ablate in Kerbin's atmosphere! Helluva aerobraking ahead.

We are breaking out of Plaid speeds. We're going to hypergridic speeds. We're almost there. If plaid is going orthagonal to spacetime, hypergridic speeds are so fast they are going orthoganal to hyperspacetime.
I had to write at least one post in here! I had to. Can't wait for 1.0.
Four pages on new page load, 16 to go!
Don't stop hyping!!!

> 
> almost there...let us just hope that there will be no holds because of range violation

In another thread, it was noted that this would be the needed response for that problem.![Ship-Sinking.jpg](http://images.thetruthaboutcars.com/2012/08/Ship-Sinking.jpg)
Maybe Harv is just waiting for this thread to get to 299 Pages then he will release to troll us ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
I think I will undertake finding the first Kraken in 1.0
\*starts throwing in karbonite infused chunks of hypecoal the size of mountains\*
We can rea....noo, I mean we WILL reach 300 pages pretty soon!!
Who will have the legendary 300 post? Tune in next week to find out.
Dooont stop.... Hyyyping!
